description:
Tampa's Premiere Disability And Injury Practice

If you live in Tampa, Florida, or the surrounding areas and are struggling with a debilitating illness or injury that prevents you from working, Avard Law Offices, P.A., strives to be the dependable legal advocate you deserve during your time of need.

Focusing primarily on Social Security Disability benefits claims and appeals, the attorneys at the law firm work hard to help their clients secure their rightful compensation so they can support themselves and their families. In addition, those adversely affected by someone else's negligence or wrongdoing can count on the law firm to help them recover the damages and losses they sustained through a motor vehicle accident, a workplace accident, medical malpractice or nursing home abuse.

Dedicated to serving those who served their country, the firm also represents disabled veterans in their efforts in obtaining 100 percent of their compensation from the Veterans Administration.

Serving The Area For Nearly 30 Years

Since 1989, experienced disability attorney Carol Avard and her dedicated associates and legal staff have served the residents of Central and Southwestern Florida. With two attorneys certified in Social Security Disability by the National Board of Trial Advocacy and offering services in a variety of languages, including French, Spanish, Ukrainian and Russian, the law firm provides a level of support other practices in the region simply cannot match.

Find Out More With No Risk

To find out more about how Avard Law Offices, P.A., can best serve you and your family during your time of need, you can contact the law firm to schedule a free, no-obligation consultation.
